analyzed: rgya gar skad du

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dbyangs can ma sgrub thabs

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gsung mnga'i 'od zer spro mdzad ngag ni mtshar ba'i ro dbyangs dang ldan pas //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgya rnams gsung mnga d zer spro mdzad ngag ni mtshar ba ro dbyangs dang ldan ba

original: myang ba rnams la phan mdzad rgal dka' mi zad gti mug mun pa nye bar 'joms mdzad ma //
analyzed: myang ba rnams la phan mdzad rgal dka mi zad gti mug mun ba nye ba joms mdzad ma

original: yon tan rang bzhin rdo rje dbyangs can ma khyod la 'dud 'dir de'i yan lag mnyes byed pa //
analyzed: yon tan rang bzhin rdo rje dbyangs can ma khyod la dud dir de yan lag mnyes byed ba

original: blo gros rtogs dka'i dbang du byas nas 'gor la phan phyir bde bar gshegs su lugs bshad par bya //
analyzed: blo gros rtogs dka dbang du byed nas gor la phan phyir bde ba gshegs su lugs chad ba byed

original: dang po nyid du gdong sogs dag par byas la rab tu snga bar brtse ldan bzod pa can //
analyzed: dang po nyid du gdong sogs dag ba byed la rab tu snga ba brtse ldan bzod ba can

original: byams pa mgu bas rangs pa'i dga' ba dang ldan gang yin sngags pas gtsang ma'i gos dang ni //
analyzed: byams ba mgu ba rangs ba dga ba dang ldan gang yin sngags ba gtsang ma gos dang ni

original: gnas kyang yid 'phrog par ni nyin yang rung ste rang gi snying gar padma blta bar bya //
analyzed: gnas kyang yid phrog ba ni nyin yang rung ste rang gi snying gar padma lta ba byed

original: der ni dri med aa las nges par byung ba'i zla ba legs par bsgom bya de la yang //
analyzed: der ni dri med aa las nges ba byung ba zla ba legs ba bsgom byed de la yang

original: do: yig 'od zer gyis ni dgang bar bya dang phyogs mtha' kun du khyab bya de las ni //
analyzed: do: yig d zer gyis ni geng ba byed dang phyogs mtha kun du khyab byed de las ni

original: mdun du sangs rgyas tshogs rnams blta bya me tog la sogs mchod la 'di dag bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mdun du sangs rgya tshogs rnams lta byed me tog la sogs mchod la di dag bsgom ba byed

original: de nas phyag 'tshal yang ni 'di yis sdig pa so sor bshags bya de bzhin bsod nams la //
analyzed: de nas phyag tshal yang ni di yis sdig ba so sor chags byed de bzhin bsod nams la

original: rjes su yi rang gsum la skyabs 'gro yang dag par ni brjod par bya ba'o sngags rig pas //
analyzed: rjes su yi rang gsum la skyob gro yang dag ba ni rjod ba byed ba sngags rig ba

original: zhes sogs bsngo byas par ni legs byas yang dag bdag nyid kyang ste rtog pa'i dra pa ni //
analyzed: zhes sogs sngo byed ba ni legs byed yang dag bdag nyid kyang ste rtogs ba dra ba ni

original: thams cad de yis stong par dmigs bya de nas sna tshogs 'di dag ma lus bsgom bya ba //
analyzed: thams cad de yis stong ba dmigs byed de nas sna tshogs di dag ma lus bsgom byed ba

original: gcig dang du bral dang ldan tshig ni brjod bya dag pa dam pa'i ye shes kyis rig bya //
analyzed: gcig dang du bral dang ldan tshig ni rjod byed dag ba dam ba ye shes kyis rig byed

original: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no //
analyzed: aom stong ba nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no

original: stod nyid las ni nges byung padma zla ba dag la nyer gnas do: yig dmar po'o //
analyzed: stod nyid las ni nges byung padma zla ba dag la nyer gnas do: yig dmar po

original: yang ni sna tshogs 'od zer tshogs kyis shin tu mdzes gyur de las padma 'dab brgyad pa //
analyzed: yang ni sna tshogs d zer tshogs kyis shin tu mdzes gyur de las padma dab brgyad ba

original: de las dmar mo 'od zer cher 'bar bcom ldan 'das ma dam pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan ma //
analyzed: de las dmar mo d zer cher bar joms ldan da ma dam ba rgyan rnams kyis rgyan ma

original: g-yas bskum pa yi zhabs kyis gnas shing zhal gsum ma ste phyag drug dag gis brgyan pa mo //
analyzed: g-yas skum ba yi zhabs kyis gnas shing zhal gsum ma ste phyag drug dag gis rgyan ba mo

original: zhal g-yas mthing nag dang ni padma ral gri gri gug rnams ni bsnams pas phyag rgyas shing //
analyzed: zhal g-yas mthing nag dang ni padma ral gri gri gug rnams ni snom ba phyag rgya shing

original: g-yon zhal dkar po dang ni de bzhi thod bcas rin chen dam pa dang ni 'khor lo bsnams //
analyzed: g-yon zhal dkar po dang ni de bzhi thod cha rin chen dam ba dang ni khor lo snom

original: snying gi padma la gnas zla ba'i dbus su @226a nyer gnas der yang do: ni 'bar gyur pas //
analyzed: snying gi padma la gnas zla ba dbus su nyer gnas der yang do: ni bar gyur ba

original: sna tshogs pa yi gti mug nye bar bcom pas byas shing spros pa yis ni 'jig rten dag byas te //
analyzed: sna tshogs ba yi gti mug nye ba joms ba byed shing spros ba yis ni jig rten dag byed te

original: nye bar bsdus la rang snying zla ba sa bon la ni bzhag par blta bya yang ni spro //
analyzed: nye ba sdud la rang snying zla ba sa bon la ni jog ba lta byed yang ni spro

original: de nyid 'dir ni yud tsam yud tsam nyi ma re rer bsgom bya rtag tu de lta ba'i //
analyzed: de nyid dir ni yud tsam yud tsam nyi ma re rer bsgom byed rtag tu de lta ba

original: bsgoms byas skyon 'di yis 'dir ni sa bon tshogs pa legs par btang la 'di yi sngags //
analyzed: sgom byed skyon di yis dir ni sa bon tshogs ba legs ba gtong la di yi sngags

original: phreng ba brgyud pa mar me'i rnam pa'i rim pas snying por gyur pa'i sngags 'di 'dra ba bzlas //
analyzed: phreng ba brgyud ba mar me rnam ba rim ba snying por gyur ba sngags di dra ba bzlas

original: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradzny'a bardha ni dzva la dzva zla me dha bardha ni dhi ri dhi ri budhi bardha ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradznya bardha ni dzva la dzva zla me dha bardha ni dhi ri dhi ri budhi bardha ni sva ha

original: lha mo'i sku ni yid la brtag bya rab tu dga' bas thun tshod rnams ni thams cad la //
analyzed: lha mo sku ni yid la rtog byed rab tu dga ba thun tshod rnams ni thams cad la

original: sngags ni legs bzla bde gshegs lugs kyis sems can don phyir 'di dag yongs su bsngo ba dang // dgos pa sgrub pa'i dbang gis bsam gtan la ni rtse gcig gnas par bya ba'o ji srid du //
analyzed: sngags ni legs bzla bde gshegs lugs kyis sems can don phyir di dag yongs su sngo ba dang dgos ba sgrub ba dbang gis bsam gtan la ni rtse gcig gnas ba byed ba ji srid du

original: 'bum phrag dag na ma rdzogs pas te rdzogs par gyur pa dang ni las kyi rim pa yin //
analyzed: bum phrag dag na ma rdzogs ba te rdzogs ba gyur ba dang ni las kyi rim ba yin

original: mi mthun phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad nye bar bcom pa'i bsam gtan byas pa nyid na de //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs kyi rnam ba thams cad nye ba joms ba bsam gtan byed ba nyid na de

original: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas ni ji srid zla tshes gnas par gyur par rang gi yid dang ni //
analyzed: dkar po tshes gcig nas ni ji srid zla tshes gnas ba gyur ba rang gi yid dang ni

original: de srid nub re bzhin du legs par sbyar ba nyid bya ji srid zla ba nya yi bar //
analyzed: de srid nub re bzhin du legs ba sbyor ba nyid byed ji srid zla ba nya yi ba

original: mtshan mo de nyid la yang 'di ni grub thob rgyal bar dka' dang snyan dang gas pa nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan mo de nyid la yang di ni grub thob rgyal ba dka dang snyan dang gas ba nyid gyur

analyzed: joms ldan da ma dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can ma de yang dag mnyes byed gang yin ba

analyzed: dpal ldan nag po rgyal pos dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi brgyud nas nye ba don byed nas

original: sems can rnams ni don phyir mdzes bkod las byung bsod nams bdag gis thog mar thog gyur pa //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni don phyir mdzes bkod las byung bsod nams bdag gis thogs mar thogs gyur ba

original: des ni 'gro rnams nag po dang ni cha 'dra ba bzlog par dka' ba'i grub thob snyan dang gas shog / dpal 'dzin gyis byas sgrub thabs 'di //
analyzed: des ni gro rnams nag po dang ni cha dra ba bzlog ba dka ba grub thob snyan dang gas shog dpal dzin gyis byed sgrub thabs di

original: gal te sangs rgyas rnal 'byor //
analyzed: gal te sangs rgya rnal byor

original: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can gyi //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can gyi

analyzed: jo byed nang gi khyad ba yin

analyzed: phag ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma sgrub thabs so

original: // / pandi ta chen po d'a dang aa bha ya dang aa ma ra la sogs pa las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o /
